text: Ahaziah ne king i dono madalua maa lua ono ngadau i dono madua. Mee gaa dagi i Jerusalem di ngadau e dahi. Ahaziah nogo daudali labelaa nnangaahai di madahaanau o King Ahab, idimaa dono dinana go Athaliah, tama ahina a King Ahab ge tama ahina madua ni di King Omri o Israel gu helekai hagamaamaa gi mee dela gaa hidi iei mee gaa hai di huaidu.
